DOC.brief_title: Treatment SSRI-Resistant Depression In Adolescents ( TORDIA )
DOC.detailed_description: The TORDIA study aim develop useful clinical guideline care management adolescent depression . Adolescents age 12 18 , currently take prescribe selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) still experience depression , participate 12-week randomize treatment study include one four condition : ( 1 ) switch alternative SSRI , ( 2 ) switch different non-SSRI antidepressant , ( 3 ) switch alternative SSRI receive cognitive behavioral therapy ( CBT ) , ( 4 ) switch different non-SSRI antidepressant receive CBT . This double-blind study , mean neither participant clinical staff know three possible medication assign . Participants respond assign treatment receive 12 additional week treatment . Those appear get well offer 12 week alternative , individualized treatment plan base participant 's particular need . All participant receive follow-up psychiatric evaluation 12 month 12-week continuation phase study , regardless treatment adherence .
